a thousandfold
by a thousand times: Subscriber numbers have grown a thousandfold. Imagine that emotion but multiplied a thousandfold. Astonishingly, sales had increased a thousandfold during those two decades. My respect for them had grown a thousandfold. Trust me, the advantages outweigh the disadvantages a thousandfold. With children, these feelings are magnified a thousandfold.
